text: Te, kotoryye schitali lozh'yu Nashi znameniya vo Vselennoy, soderzhashchiyesya v Nashikh Pisaniyakh, prevoznosilis' nad nimi, ne sledovali im i ne raskayalis', u etikh ne budut prinyaty nikakiye deyaniya, ikh Allakh ne poshchadit i ne budet k nim miloserden. Nad nimi ne otkroyutsya vrata raya, poka ne voydot verblyud v igol'noye ushko. Tak My vozdayom nevernym, vysokomernym, nechestivym v kazhdoy obshchine
